issue.title: [Python] Review GIL release and acquisition in to_pandas conversion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-431](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-431). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are some places where we should be acquiring the GIL, and we may not be consistently releasing the GIL.

comments.body:

This was discussed in the PR for ARROW-420
